title: THEODORA DOUBLE TRILLION, LAB WHITE SAPPHIRE SILVER RIVIÈRE BRACELET
description: Crafted from individual 0.25 carat trillion shaped lab-grown white sapphires set in sterling silver, the Theodora rivière bracelet makes a striking entrance this season.
details:

Setting: 3-prong
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire
Stone Shape: Trillion cut
Stone Size: 4mm
